product.name: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
product.tagline: Illuminate Your Glow with Vitamin C Power
product.headline: Unlock Radiant Skin with 10% Vitamin C GlowBoost Serum
product.description: Unlock a brighter, more even-toned complexion with GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum, harnessing the power of 10% Vitamin C to illuminate your skin. This potent serum not only brightens, but also fades dark spots, revealing a radiant glow that lasts. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid for an extra dose of hydration, GlowBoost is perfect for oily and combination skin types, providing a balanced and effective solution for a more vibrant you. By combining these key ingredients, GlowBoost delivers unparalleled brightening benefits, giving you the confidence to glow from within.

ingredient_details.name: Vitamin C
ingredient_details.description: A potent antioxidant that helps neutralize free radicals, brighten and even out skin tone, and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

ingredient_details.name: Hyaluronic Acid
ingredient_details.description: A natural humectant that retains moisture in the skin, providing long-lasting hydration, plumping, and firming the skin for a more radiant and youthful appearance.

detailed_benefits.description: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum helps to even out skin tone and gives your skin a radiant glow, making it look brighter and more vibrant.
This serum effectively reduces the appearance of dark spots and hyperpigmentation, leaving your skin with a more uniform and smoother complexion.

how_to_use.raw_instructions: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen
how_to_use.summary: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

steps: Apply 2-3 drops of GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum to your face and neck in the morning
Gently massage the serum into your skin until fully absorbed
tips: Use before applying sunscreen for optimal results

precautions: Perform a patch test before using GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum, especially if you have sensitive skin, as it may cause mild tingling. Start with a small amount and gradually increase as your skin becomes more tolerant. Avoid applying the serum on broken or irritated skin.
who_should_avoid: Individuals with extremely sensitive skin, those with open wounds or skin irritation, and people who are allergic to vitamin C or any other ingredients in the serum
expanded_safety.storage: Store GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight and heat sources, to maintain its potency and effectiveness.
